channel.title: How can i change weapon strength bonus?

item.title: How can i change weapon strength bonus?
item.dc:creator: @Ed_ere Ed_ere
item.description:
@Ed_ere wrote:

itachi uchia basically got it right but ill give a detailed verson.

the file to edit is item.cfg

say you wanted to edit whip…the item id is 4151
it will look like this

item = 4151	Abyssal_whip	A_weapon_from_the_abyss.	651608.0013642381	651608.0013642381	850929.5918252946	0	82	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	82	0

1)Now the 4151 is the item id…
2)Next is the name of the item.
3)Is the examine info of them item
4)The Next free numbers are about that shop sell and buy price, and the high alch money return
5)now comes the bonuses… the first five numbers are the attack bonuses. starting with stab,slash,crush,mage and range…
the next five are the defensive ins ame order as attack…
the last two numbers are prayer and strength bonuses, strenght first and prayer after…

To change the bonuses just change the numbers i mentioned as bonuses…

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change weapon strength bonus?

item.title: How can i change weapon strength bonus?
item.dc:creator: @itachi_uchia itachi uchia
item.description:
@itachi_uchia wrote:

Step one-open moparscape.
Step two: Click on the item list.
Step three: Open you’r source.
Step four: Open item.cfg.
Step5: Look at the ID of the item you want to change ( 1050 would be santa hat ).
Now quik find the ID of the item you want to change.
Now change the numbers beside the name to what you want the bonuses to be.

I dont know the order of the bonuses.

PS: The writing beside the item ID that isn’t numbers is examination.

EDIT: I MADE A TUT OUT OF THIS! YOU INSPIRED ME BECAUSE YOU ASKED AND YOU’R ON CREDITS!!

LINK:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,98166.0.html

Read full topic
